parameters: The repair of the facility is not yet complete...
Go finish it in the restroom.
Seems like we haven't gathered all the intel yet.
Keep searching carefully.
We should have gathered all the intelligence by now. Let's head back and report.
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Employee>You must be the worker here to fix the company's power supply, right?
That thing is at the very back of the restroom, hurry and go over there.
\n<Employee>I'm currently the only person on duty in the Information Department.
So exhausted to the point of death, yet there's still no guarantee of quality of life.
\n<Employee>We're working ourselves to death here,
and that old man outside is doing such a high-class secretary?
What the hell is up with this inspection, it's completely crazy.
\n<Employee>Go get to work, don't bother me anymore!
A
Go find the person in charge of this floor to understand the situation.
\n<Employee>Damn, if I get out,
There's also plenty of whores to fuck.
When will this work ever come to an end?
\n<Employee> Get to work, and stop bothering me!
\n<Employee> Oh, I see.
Once the job is done, leave quickly.
The employee continued working without looking back...
\n<Staff> How did you get here? The equipment is in the restroom.
Get to work quickly!
There should still be intel that hasn't been obtained...
Come back to repair the equipment after collecting everything.
Just put this thing in, right?
As the Deputy Manager mentioned, just by looking at it, I know how to fix it...
It should be fine, go report to that employee above.
\..\..\..The equipment is currently operating normally.
There are a lot of files inside... but none of them seem useful.
A
There's nothing left to investigate here.
Research Report on the Special Drug—
After extensive research, we successfully developed
a special medicine that can completely cure wounds inflicted by zombies.
Not only can it effectively prevent infection,
but it can also significantly enhance the body's immunity to the virus.
On the other hand—
The side effects of the miracle drug soon became apparent.
Users may experience various delayed reactions,
impairments in cognitive ability, and drowsiness.
It doesn't seem to be the file we're looking for, let's check some others.
A
There's nothing left to investigate here.
Found a pile of experimental records tossed on the chair.
It seems to be related to the previous mutant experiment subjects...
There are many copies...
Take one back with you.
A
There's nothing more to investigate here.
